General.Name: Sichuan Teway Food Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Teway Food Group Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of compound seasonings in China. It offers approximately 100 varieties of hot pot seasonings for use in hot pot soup, and to make stir-fried vegetables, pasta, etc.; Chinese dish seasonings to make Chinese dishes, such as boiled fish, spicy chicken, kung pao chicken, crayfish, etc.; sausage bacon seasonings to make sausages and bacons in households, canteens and restaurants, spicy sauces, etc.; chicken essence for use in home cooking and food manufacturing; spicy sauce for cooking various Sichuan dishes, cold dishes, and pasta; sweet noodle sauce to cook sauce pop and sauce cooking. The company provides its products under the Good People, Dahongpao, and Tianche brand names. It also exports its products to the United States, Australia, Spain, Japan, Singapore, Peru, and other countries. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 333 Tengfei First Road, Chengdu, China, 610021
